mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_IDX as idx, CUSTOMER_NAME as name, CUSTOMER_PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, CUSTOMER_NICK_NAME as nickName, CUSTOMER_EMAIL as email, CUSTOMER_GENDER as gender FROM CUSTOMER WHERE 1=1

SELECT c.CUSTOMER_NAME as orderName, o.ORDER_IDX as orderIdx, o.ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME as productName, o.ORDER_DATE as orderDate, o.ORDER_CUSTOMER_IDX as orderCustomerIdx FROM CUSTOMER_ORDERS o LEFT JOIN CUSTOMER c ON o.ORDER_CUSTOMER_IDX = c.CUSTOMER_IDX WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY o.ORDER_CUSTOMER_IDX ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, #{perPageNum}
